name: What hour can we show?
description:
We are the most disorganized TV channel in the world!!! 

We need your help, please!

We present a television show, and at the begging we show the hours in a "paper analogic advanced display". But our show must start earlier as possible, and sometimes we don't have some many digits to present.

So...

I MUST show the hours in the begging of a show, but I have just fews numbers to organized my "paper" display.

Imagine that I have the numbers {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}.

How earlier our show can start?

Ok, ok! I'm using 24 hours clock, we do not use AM or PM...

So, my show can start at 12:34:56.

I need show a valid hour, and we must use all papers in the "screen".

If there is no valid hour, just return "NOT_NOW".
